channel.title: Canada '67
channel.description:
This series focuses on Canada's Expo '67 celebration and other events celebrating the 100th anniversary of the founding of Canada.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Program 2
item.description: This program presents several brief news stories related to Expo 67 and other events celebrating the 100th anniversary of Canada's founding.
item.dc:creator: Harding, Bob
item.dc:subject: Science & Technology
